description:
Designed for, and tested in, the world's most challenging mountain races, the X-Talon G 210 V2 is protective, stable and grippy. Inov-8's amazing graphene-infused sole holds up to hundreds of kilometers of trail, scree and slab rock. The new CORDURA® upper is super durable, while the resilient EVA midsole is firm enough for protection and grooved for flexibility on technical terrain.

  • Lightweight CORDURA® mesh upper with thermoplastic overlays for durability
  • Injected EVA midsole effectively absorbs shock with responsive energy return from each impact
  • 3mm drop promotes natural running form, while reducing tension on achilles and calf
  • Graphene-enhanced rubber outsole compound is significantly grippier and more durable than standard rubber
  • Aggressive 8mm lugs bite into soft and loose terrain
name: Inov-8 X-Talon G 210 V2 Trail Running Shoes - Women's
